Job Title: Data Center Senior Design Manager

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Overview

As a Senior   Design Manager  at Linesight , you will work with highly experienced, culturally diverse, and passionate teams nurturing a strong social dynamic and a shared sense of achievement. You will gain vast industry experience that will open doors for you, extend your skillset and expand your perspective. We will empower, support, and enable you to take real responsibility in your role so that you can take charge of your career progression with us. For us lasting trusted relationships are everything, both with our teams and our clients.

 The Opportunity 

In This Role You Will

 Manage the successful delivery of the Data Center design packages and ensure that the business benefit is delivered  Coordinate with project partners to ensure the delivery is within scope, on time, using agreed resources and is to a high quality  Lead a team of design members, ensuring that the requirements of all project stages are delivered in accordance with the Capital Project Delivery Process  Develop robust reporting to ensure timely decision-making  Own the design change register, identifying & reviewing any changes and obtaining the required authorization for changes in scope  Ensure design documents are complete, updated and stored appropriately at all stages  Seek new areas for improvement through active reviews of the design packages, communicating good practices and lessons learned 


We Would Love To Hear From You If You

 Have a Bachelor’s degree in an engineering field, with an additional Master’s degree in engineering management, technical management or business administration a distinct advantage  Have experience working on hyperscale Data Center projects or similiar  Have a Project Management qualification or are on the path to complete it. We can help!  Have experience in engineering and/or project management, with the capability to manage large-scale projects  Love a dynamic environment with the opportunity to manage your own priorities and deadlines  Are results-oriented and enjoy working across teams and projects to meet schedules and milestones  Thrive on building strong relationships with your team and clients through a shared purpose and sense of openness and fun 


Salary range for this position is between $151,385 to $164,000, but actual salary offered will be dependent upon education, skills, and experience

About Us

Linesight is a highly successful global project and cost management consultancy that keeps clients coming back. And for that we have our people to thank. You see we’re not like the others. We’re different. Unique. It’s our fresh thinking and focus on what matters that has led to our evolving. We are on a journey working in some of the most exciting innovative sectors with some of the world’s most prestigious companies delivering major projects that deliver a more sustainable built environment. We have an open culture and a flat structure where you can expect to be treated with genuine care, respect, and empathy. With Linesight, you can truly discover the power of team!

Diversity, inclusion and accessibility

Linesight is committed to transparent, equal opportunity employment practices. We are building a diverse and inclusive organisation, accessible to all, based on having a safe culture which enables all our people to be their true selves. We are a people business, and we understand that the more inclusive we are, the happier our people and better our work will be. We will ensure that individuals with disability are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the application or recruitment process and are accommodated in the workplace. If you require assistance or accommodation of any kind, please mention this in your application, we would love to hear from you!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
